banner.subtitle: Live with comfort, safety and prestige

about.title: About the company
about.subtitle: Our history and values
about.description: Nuran Stroy is a company with 37 years of experience in construction, which has established itself as a reliable and responsible developer in Kyrgyzstan. We have a 1st level of responsibility license, which allows us to implement projects of any complexity with a high quality standard. Each of our buildings is the result of many years of experience, the latest technology and deep respect for our clients.
about.projectSubtitle: Unique opportunities for life and investment
about.projectDescription: Nuran Park is not just housing, it is a smart investment in the future. High quality construction, prestigious location and unique conditions make apartments in our complex in demand on the real estate market. Your decision to invest in Nuran Park is a choice of reliability, comfort and stability.
